ygData.subject: RE: Need more bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, my necro friend said Clarity overwrote (canceled or didn t stack, I dunno) the mana regen benefit of being in skeletal form.  He said to just keep
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 20 Dec 1999, JasonF wrote:
>
> I've got a necro friend that turns into a pile of bones between fights with
> Call of Bones. It's actually kind of annoying as I now have to sit at my
> keyboard and weave Hymn and Clarity just for her. Whereas she can go afk or
> watch TV or whatever. But. I don't complain to her. Much.

Hmm, my necro friend said Clarity overwrote (canceled or
didn't stack, I dunno) the mana regen benefit of being in
skeletal form. He said to just keep Hymn playing. Since he
was the only necro I regularly grouped with, I took his word
for it and didn't press the matter.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
